original_title: Mój spis z natury we wsi Lezno Male
overview: For Paweł łoziński, the population census becomes an excuse to show a fragment of the Polish countryside. The camera's filling in for the census clerk. We visited several farms in one of the small villages. We ask questions that are not in the census form, about the meaning of life, dreams, needs.
title: My Inventory of Nature in the Village of Lezno Male
